<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Qi Zhong (Master of Medicine)](/Deities.aspx?ID=182)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Teach knowledge to others, relieve suffering despite personal difficulty, heal sickness and injuries

**Anathema** Deal lethal damage to another living creature (unless as part of a necessary medical treatment).

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, N, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

**Favored Weapon** [heavy mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)

**Domains** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **2nd**
[False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108)

- **4th**
[Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255)

</column>
name: Qi Zhong (Master of Medicine)
